scripts.a11y: yarn a11y:contrast && yarn a11y:text-alternatives && yarn a11y:media && yarn a11y:semantic && yarn a11y:distinguishable && yarn a11y:keyboard && yarn a11y:enough-time && yarn a11y:seizures && yarn a11y:navigable && yarn a11y:input-modalities && yarn a11y:readable && yarn a11y:predictable && yarn a11y:input-assistance && yarn a11y:compatible && yarn a11y:autocomplete
scripts.seo: yarn seo:validate && yarn seo:schema && yarn seo:links
scripts.lighthouse:desktop:ci: lhci collect --config=.lighthouserc.ci.js && lhci upload --config=.lighthouserc.ci.js --target=filesystem --outputDir=./lighthouse-desktop && node scripts/process-lhci-results.js --manifestDir=lighthouse-desktop --outputJson=lighthouse-results.json --outputHtml=lighthouse-desktop.html --targetUrl=${LIGHTHOUSE_URL:-http://localhost:3000/} && lhci assert --config=.lighthouserc.ci.js
scripts.lighthouse:mobile:ci: lhci collect --config=lighthouse.mobile.config.ci.js && lhci upload --config=lighthouse.mobile.config.ci.js --target=filesystem --outputDir=./lighthouse-mobile && node scripts/process-lhci-results.js --manifestDir=lighthouse-mobile --outputJson=lighthouse-mobile-results.json --outputHtml=lighthouse-mobile.html --targetUrl=${LIGHTHOUSE_URL:-http://localhost:3000/} && lhci assert --config=lighthouse.mobile.config.ci.js
scripts.lighthouse:desktop: rm -rf .lighthouse lighthouse-desktop && lhci collect --config=.lighthouserc.js && lhci upload --config=.lighthouserc.js --target=filesystem --outputDir=./lighthouse-desktop && node scripts/process-lhci-results.js --manifestDir=lighthouse-desktop --outputJson=lighthouse-results.json --outputHtml=lighthouse-desktop.html --targetUrl=${LIGHTHOUSE_URL:-http://localhost:3000/} && lhci assert --config=.lighthouserc.js
scripts.lighthouse:mobile: rm -rf .lighthouse .lighthouse-mobile lighthouse-mobile && lhci collect --config=lighthouse.mobile.config.js && lhci upload --config=lighthouse.mobile.config.js --target=filesystem --outputDir=./lighthouse-mobile && node scripts/process-lhci-results.js --manifestDir=lighthouse-mobile --outputJson=lighthouse-mobile-results.json --outputHtml=lighthouse-mobile.html --targetUrl=${LIGHTHOUSE_URL:-http://localhost:3000/} && lhci assert --config=lighthouse.mobile.config.js
scripts.check:all: yarn build && yarn format && yarn lint && yarn a11y && yarn perf && yarn seo && yarn validate:ogimages
